thread.title: Nicola Sturgeon warns indy ref 2 'unstoppable' if UK leaves EU
thread.title_full: Nicola Sturgeon warns indy ref 2 'unstoppable' if UK leaves EU

author: Simon Johnson
title: Nicola Sturgeon warns indy ref 2 'unstoppable' if UK leaves EU
text: Nicola Sturgeon Nicola Sturgeon warns indy ref 2 'unstoppable' if UK leaves EU The First Minister tries to placate SNP members who are unhappy at her decision to oppose a rerun of last year's vote in the near future. First Minister Nicola Sturgeon delivers a welcome address to the 81st Annual SNP conference at the Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference centre Photo: Jeff J Mitchell/Getty Images By Simon Johnson , Scottish Political Editor 1:05PM BST 15 Oct 2015
